***** Hindi[edit] *****
**** Etymology[edit] ****
Borrowed from Sanskrit आलु (ālu).
**** Pronunciation[edit] ****
    * (Delhi Hindi) IPA(key): /ɑː.luː/, [äː.l̪uː]
**** Noun[edit] ****
आलु • (ālu) m (Urdu spelling آلو‎)
   1. Synonym of आलू (ālū)
*** Declension[edit] ***
Declension of आलु (masc u-stem)
                                    singular plural
                           direct   आलु      आलु
                                    ālu      ālu
                           oblique  आलु      आलुओं
                                    ālu      āluõ
                           vocative आलु      आलुओ
                                    ālu      āluo
***** Nepali[edit] *****
**** Pronunciation[edit] ****
    * IPA(key): [älu]
    * Phonetic Devanagari: आलु
**** Noun[edit] ****
आलु • (ālu)
   1. potato
   2. zero, jack

***** Sanskrit[edit] *****
**** Etymology[edit] ****
From Proto-Indo-Aryan *HaHlu, from Proto-Indo-Iranian *HaHlu, from Proto-Indo-
European *h₂eHlu (“edible root”). Cognate with Latin alium (“onion, garlic”).
**** Pronunciation[edit] ****
    * (Vedic) IPA(key): /ɑː.lu/
    * (Classical) IPA(key): /ˈɑː.l̪u/
**** Noun[edit] ****
आलु • (ālu) n
   1. an edible root
   2. (neologism) potato
